sentences.en: Anxiety comes from not being able to orient yourself in your own existence.
sentences.cn: 不能适应生活便会产生焦虑。

sentences.en: belief in the existence of a benevolent god
sentences.cn: 对于仁慈的神之存在的笃信

sentences.en: He does not believe in the existence of ghosts.
He had been a rock in the shifting sands of her existence.
sentences.cn: 他一直是她曲折坎坷的生活中的主心骨。

sentences.en: Her existence was lightened by bits of gossip.
sentences.cn: 她的生活靠了飞短流长才不那么乏味。

sentences.en: I was left with puzzlement as to the existence or non-existence of God.
sentences.cn: 我对上帝存在与否还是困惑不解。

sentences.en: I was unaware of his existence until today.
sentences.cn: 直到今天我才知道有他这么个人。

sentences.en: Most religions posit the existence of life after death.
sentences.cn: 大多数宗教都假定人死后生命仍存在。

sentences.en: New companies come into existence every year.
sentences.cn: 每年都有新的公司开业.

sentences.en: Pablo led a miserable existence when he first moved to San Juan.
sentences.cn: 巴勃罗刚搬到圣胡安时，生活很悲惨。

sentences.en: Scientists have many theories about how the universe first came into existence (= started to exist ).
sentences.cn: 关于宇宙的起源，科学家有多种理论。

sentences.en: Temperature records have unequivocally confirmed the existence of global warming.
sentences.cn: 气温记录清楚无疑地证实了全球气候正在变暖。

sentences.en: This house has been in existence for many years.
Trees owe their existence to soil.
What a wretched existence the people in the slum lead!
sentences.cn: 这个贫民窟里的人们过着多么令人悲惨的生活啊!

sentences.en: What a wretched existence these people lead in the slums!
sentences.cn: 住在贫民窟里的这些人生活多可怜 呀 !

sentences.en: You may be stuck with a miserable existence for the rest of your life.
sentences.cn: 你可能一辈子都要过着悲惨的生活。

words.tran_cn: 存在主义的；有关存在的；存在判断的
存在；生存；生活；继续存在

phrases.tran_cn: 现有的；现存的；实际存在的；实有的
